legacy.full_text: China opened the world’s first 1.2TB/s capacity ultra-high-speed backbone network connecting Beijing, Wuhan, and Guangzhou on Monday, aiming to provide high-speed and stable Internet infrastructure for Chinese network users. https://t.co/h48OZ4haKq

legacy.full_text: Chinese scientists have developed a numerical model to simulate the atmospheric environment of Mars, offering research support for China's sample-return mission to the Red Planet, which is planned for the Tianwen 3 mission in around 2028. (Journal Chinese Science Bulletin) https://t.co/h9gtEB89Qx

legacy.full_text: The incidence of type 1 diabetes in China is growing rapidly and occurring at a younger age, with the peak age of onset between 10 and 14 years old, experts said ahead of World Diabetes Day, which falls on Tuesday this year. https://t.co/NfvcYsybVh

legacy.name: China Science

legacy.full_text:
Chinese scientists have developed a granule that could potentially treat Alzheimer's disease. 

Lab rats infected with Alzheimer's disease showed significant improvement in behavior after ingesting the granule, according to a study published in the academic journal Nature Aging. https://t.co/pbAnGEM3YT

legacy.name: China Science

legacy.full_text: China has started construction of world's largest offshore solar power plant, also the country's first 1-GW offshore #PV project, in E China's Shandong. The plant is expected to generate 1.78 bln kWh of electricity annually upon completion, cutting 1.44 mln tons of CO2 emissions. https://t.co/tnq0TO7hvc

legacy.full_text: A total of 263 tombs, including 237 ones from about 2,000 years ago, were discovered in northwest China's Shaanxi Province, said local archaeologists. Some 878 cultural relics were unearthed, including bronzeware, jade articles, stone objects, iron pieces, and pottery. https://t.co/eYgQm5TeVk

legacy.full_text: China's Long March-2F Y-19 #CarrierRocket has entered the final assembly. The new rocket is of the Long March-2F series, China's only manned carrier rocket series and will shoulder #Shenzhou crewed missions in 2024. https://t.co/x1MQys5zgw

legacy.full_text: China-developed world's largest 18 MW direct-drive offshore wind turbine rolled off assembly line in SE China's Fujian Fri. At an average annual wind speed of 10m/s, a single unit can output 72 mln kWh of clean electricity per year, reducing CO2 emissions by over 55,000 tonnes. https://t.co/kwVxwKPILD

legacy.full_text: Chinese scientists have discovered a 190-million-year-old fossilized nest of 3 adult skeletons and about 50 embryo-containing eggs in Anshun, SW China's Guizhou, providing evidence for the earliest known leathery eggs and shedding light on unique #dinosaur reproductive features. https://t.co/9svECZImSP

legacy.full_text: China has recently discovered possibly the closest near-Earth #asteroid to Earth detected by its astronomical observatory. The asteroid 2023 VB2's closest point to the Earth was 33,000 km away and it arrived at this point around 3 pm Tuesday, posing no direct threat to the Earth. https://t.co/pzpebgPaP4
